name: Colziand
startIntroPart1: Oh Raymond! You who formed a nation of people for God to saved, glorious you are. Thanks be to the mighty Father.
startIntroPart2: Will you once more rule the world for the Lord's desire.
attacked: I'm dissapointed! Why declare destruction, is there no fun in peace and prosperity?
defeated: Colziand is its people, me, and Him.
introduction: Kumusta sa'inyo. O estranghero, saan ka galing?
hateHello: You speak in pride, I don't wanna hear it
tradeRequest: It appears that you have a golden interest of our goods
uniqueText: Adopting new Policy branch may trigger Social Change event in your Capital, which will provide Free Technology once completed.
uniques: +[4] happiness from each type of luxury resource
[+1 Science, +1 Food, +1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Happiness] from every specialist [in all cities]
100% chance to earn 25 Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit from a conquered encampment
100% chance of capturing defeated Barbarian naval units and earning 25 Gold
[+10 Science, +10 Food, +10 Gold, +10 Production, +10 Culture, +10 Faith, +10 Happiness] from [All] tiles [in all cities]
Quantity of Resources gifted by City-States increased by [1000]%
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [1000]
Cities are razed [1000] times as fast
Influence of all other civilizations with all city-states degrades [1000]% faster
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [2000]% more Influence
Quantity of strategic resources produced by the empire +[1000]%
Religion naturally spreads to cities [+99999] tiles away
Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged
"Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [10] turns.
Can embark and move over Coasts and Oceans immediately
May choose [5] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Worker] is earned
Units ending their turn on [Mountain] tiles take [1] damage
